andromeda.why: Refuses to seize power; waits for rightful call—sovereign influence.

arcturus.why: Organizes the voice—right role, scope, and tempo for influence.

draco.why: Status optics can creep in—rank signaling around the mic.

lyra.why: Clean phrasing and tone help the message land.

orion-dark.why: Risk of forcing authority via rules instead of consent.

orion-light.why: Courage to speak for the group without overreach.

pleiades.why: Attuned tone keeps the field receptive to leadership.

sirius.why: Early self-regulation of voice; no transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Holds mandate without surrendering to flattery or pressure.

arcturus.why: Places authority within scope, timing, and proper channel.

draco.why: Guards thresholds—who speaks for whom and when.

lyra.why: Refines wording so representation is clear.

orion-dark.why: Conforming to 'how leaders talk' over truth.

orion-light.why: Discipline to represent the group rather than self.

pleiades.why: Relational attunement to constituents regulates delivery.

sirius.why: Relational leadership practice; no codified protocol yet.

andromeda.why: Outsourcing agency to image or sponsors undermines sovereignty.

arcturus.why: Misplacement of authority—mixed signals and shaky process.

draco.why: Clique gatekeeping and status-posturing around the podium.

orion-dark.why: Rules and slogans used to force compliance.

orion-light.why: Trial refines honest influence and scope.

andromeda.why: Liberates process from personality—leadership by mandate.

arcturus.why: Builds fair procedures, cadence, and channels for voice.

draco.why: Upholds loyalty to process and access rules.

pleiades.why: Attuned facilitation keeps the field cooperative.

sirius.why: Teaches civic leadership protocol by example.

andromeda.why: Uses influence to free the group from authoritarian drift.

arcturus.why: Sets governance standards, roles, and accountability.

draco.why: Enforces loyalty to agreed process and territory of voice.

lyra.why: Language and tone unify the field around the charter.

orion-dark.why: Projection risk: orthodoxy policing in the name of order.

orion-light.why: Holds integrity when pressured by factions.

sirius.why: Instruction in governance/mandate—liberation through teaching standards.

andromeda.why: Embodied mandate—leads only to preserve collective freedom.

arcturus.why: Establishes enduring norms for civic timing and voice.

draco.why: Presence can read as gate to legitimacy.

orion-dark.why: Law-over-life risk—leadership canon hardens into dogma.

orion-light.why: Role-model courage to accept or decline office by truth.

sirius.why: Royal instruction: civic canon transmitted by presence/protocol.
